extension.description: SKIN FOR KODI 17....Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
SKIN FOR KODI 17.... complètement revu pour créer une apparence moderne, en gardant l'impression classique d'Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17.... complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
SKIN FOR KODI 17....Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
extension.disclaimer: Mouse control is supported, althoug not recommended. It may not work correctly in all cases.
